alert.note: Alert for Eastern Monmouth; Western Monmouth (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 4:57PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Monmouth County through 530 PM EDT... At 457 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Navesink, or near Sandy Hook, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Long Branch, Asbury Park, Sandy Hook, Middletown, Tinton Falls, Red Bank, Highlands, Elberon, Navesink, Lincroft, Eatontown, West Long Branch, Rumson, Little Silver, Oceanport, Bradley Beach, Shrewsbury, Interlaken, Deal and Allenhurst. This includes Garden State Parkway between mile markers 107 and 115. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
